```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)


here::here()
data_dir <- here("00_sporeIDs", "out_data")
raw_dir <- here("00_sporeIDs", "input")

spore.uni <- read.delim2(here(raw_dir, "uniprotkb_sporulation_AND_taxonomy_id_2_2025_01_27.tsv")) 
pfam <- subset(spore.uni, spore.uni$Pfam!="")
#pfam <- as.data.frame(pfam[,c(14)])
pfam2 <- pfam[,c(14)]

pfam2 <- gsub(";",",", pfam2)


#write.csv(pfam2, here(data_dir, "messy_pfam_list_uniprotSPORULATION.csv")) 

```
